There were no other sightings in New York on or around November 30th 1995
Summary: Hovering Disc Over Woods on Theriot Avenue
divs: Sighting DetailsI sighted a spinning hovering disc over the woods at the dead end of Theriot Avenue in the Bronx on a summer evening in 1995 or 1996. The spinning, hovering disc remained stationery for a while (I was so stunned it may have been longer or shorter than I remember) and abruptly disappeared. The disc was rimmed with many brightly colored rectangles. There were many witnesses pointing to the sky. A neighbor was filming the event. I am hoping someone will corroborate my account.
